name: Streusel Bars
author: Lorena Essner
instructions: Combine flour, brown sugar, and salt. Cut in butter or margarine with pastry blender until mixture is crumbly. Stir in oats. Save 1 1⁄2 cups of crumbly mixture for topping. Press remaining mixture evenly over bottom of oblong baking pan (13 x 9 x 2). Spread jelly, jam, or preserves over crumbs and top with remaining crumb mixture. Press down lightly. Bake in moderate oven at 375° until lightly browned about 25 minutes. Cool. Cut into bars 3 inches long and 1 inch wide.
